page.title: 11BROADWOOD FLUORSPAR PLANT
page.content: {Broadwood Fluorspar Processing Plant} employs 37 men. All but five live in Weardale-four in Frosterley itself. ore is brought here from four local mines. It is crushed and ground to a fine powder. {Fluorspar}is then removed from the other constituents by flotation. The waste material is settled in an adjacent disused quarry. The 200,000 t.p.a. of ore processed yields 90,000 t.p.a. of fluorspar products i.e.{fluorspar, lead and} {zinc sulphides and washed stone.} A large proportion of the main product-fluorspar-goes to{ICI}for hydrofluoric acid production. The highest grade spar is used in the manufacture of such products as {aluminium, gloss and welding rod {coatings.} The sulphides go to a smelting company at Avonmouth.
